statement.tex: %text The two vectors $\vector{1}{1}{}$ and $\vector{3}{-4}{4}$ represent the two sides $AB$ and $AC$, respectively of a $\triangle ABC$. Find the length of the median through $A$. %

reason.tex: %text The median passing the vertex of any triangle is the line that connects that vertex with the mid-point of the opposite side. In this case the median is the line $AO$. %
%text As per the triangle law of vectors $\ora{AB}+\ora{BC}=\ora{AC}$. Therefore, $\ora{BC}=\ora{AC}-\ora{AB}$ %
